text: Maria Fyfe (née O'Neill; 25 November 1938 - 3 December 2020) was a Scottish Labour politician. She was a Member of Parliament for Glasgow Maryhill from 1987 to 2001. Fyfe was born in Glasgow. Fyfe died on 3 December 2020 in Glasgow, aged 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:Politicians from Glasgow
title: Maria Fyfe
